thread.title: Marnie Simpson 'smashes up house' in anger following horrendous split from Lewis Bloor
thread.title_full: Marnie Simpson 'smashes up house' in anger following horrendous split from Lewis Bloor

title: Marnie Simpson 'smashes up house' in anger following horrendous split from Lewis Bloor
text:
INSTAGRAM CHEATING ROW: Footage of Lewis allegedly bedding a girl has now emerged “I can't actually believe it. I cried, I screamed, I have smashed my house up. Every emotion – I'm still in shock” Marnie Simpson 
Marnie then adds that Lewis called her as he left the hotel following his romp with the girl, named Ammelia Gueste. 
She says the relationship was "over" as soon she saw the bedroom video. 
She added: "I'd been crying my eyes out all day, thinking I could forgive him. Is your partner cheating on you? Monday, 15th August 2016 How to spot a cheat: Expert reveals the tell-tale signs that you're being deceived 1 / 11 Getty Images People around you are suspicious. If you’ve been warned by friends or family that your partner is cheating, there’s a huge possibility that they are playing away. 
GETTY GEORDIE RAMPAGE: Marnie smashed up the house when she heard of the scandal 
"And then tonight I got the worst feeling I've ever experienced when I saw the video in bed with the girl." 
The couple – who had been living in Essex together – hinted they'd split on Twitter yesterday but Marnie's gut wrenching account confirmed reports. Big Brother: The couples who had sex on television Wednesday, 10th August 2016 We take a look at the couples who succumbed to temptation and had sex in the Big Brother house 1 / 11 
GETTY BLOSSOMING ROMANCE: Lewis and Marnie first hooked up on Celebrity Big Brother 
She continued: "I can't actually believe it. I cried, I screamed, I have smashed my house up. Every emotion – I'm still in shock. 
"I've never experienced it before. It's awful. It's horrendous. I've cried all the tears I can cry, and I don't think I've got any left." 
Daily Star Online have contacted Lewis' reps for comment. Related articles
